docs.title: Endless Task List Adventure
docs.text: This app is a task list with endless adventure. It supports gamification elements like levels and experience points (XP). It uses Ruby on Rails for this project.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/endless-task-list-adventure.git
cd endless-task-list-adventure
rails server

Make sure Rails is installed and then open localhost:3000 on your web server.
